thread.title: Test your detective skills with Clue for Android
thread.title_full: Test your detective skills with Clue for Android

author: Edgar Cervantes
title: Test your detective skills with Clue for Android
text:
Surely, many of us have spent countless hours solving murders using the classic Clue board game. It was a must-have for Sundays with friends and family. Everything is going digital now, though. Forget about losing all those small pieces, Clue is now available for Android and you can get it straight from the Google Play Store.
The concept is the same. Roll the die to move around the mansion and find out who committed the murder, which weapon was used and where the incident happened. You can even use the digital notebook to take notes and make deductions!
Those who are familiar with the original game will have no trouble understanding the game. It is the same concept as the classic board game, after all.
Interested in checking out Clue? You will have to pay $3.99 for it, but that is a good price to pay for a worthy game.
Buy Clue
